docs.text: " when it's cold , molecules aren't moving .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: everything is clean . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: these are the essential words of mikey carver ( elijah wood ) , a young teenage boy living in 1973 new canaan , connecticut in the ice storm .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when mikey delivers these words to a bored science class , it is unlikely that anyone realizes how much they parallel mikey's life and the lives that surround him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his father jim ( jamey sheridan ) is rarely seen and his mother janey ( sigourney weaver ) is having an affair with married neighbor ben hood ( kevin kline ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ben's wife elena ( joan allen ) suspects the affair , but doesn't say anything .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: meanwhile , ben's 14-year-old daughter wendy ( christina ricci ) continuously lures mikey and his younger brother sandy ( adam hann-byrd ) into sexual explorations .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tobey maguire plays paul hood , the 16-year-old narrator of the story who also happens to be the least prevalent character .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we start the film with an interesting outlook on family from paul .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he compares family to the fantastic four comic book , and even goes so far as to say that family is everybody's own anti-matter ; something everybody will return to eventually , and the farther you go , the deeper you'll return .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the ice storm is a character piece that explores a dismal time both in america , and in the individual lives portrayed in the movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: everything parallels everything else .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the young teenagers trying to discover who they are thru drugs , sex , and alcohol is really almost identical to the parents trying to figure out the purpose in their own lives using the same methods .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " when it's cold outside , the molecules aren't moving .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: everything is clean . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: everything is clean because nobody will admit what's going on .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even the president is on tv denying his wrong-doings .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: how can you expect anything more out of a couple of suburban families riding the coattails of sexual revolution ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: all the sex and drugs is so obviously empty , and i think that's the point of the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: at first viewing , the entire movie might seem empty , but then why shouldn't it parallel itself ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: you don't get to know the characters very deeply , but i think that's because nobody in the movie knows each other either .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we sadly watch two families go about their lives nearly oblivious to one another .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: at first glance , you might think emotion is lost in the ending scenes because you haven't gotten to know the characters well enough to sympathize - then you realize that just might be the point , and then you do feel the pain .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the acting by all is quite good , but i particularly liked elijah wood .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he doesn't seem to be receiving as much recognition as the others , but i still found him to possess quite a real sense of being .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: christina ricci is being acclaimed for her part as the misguided teenage temptress who looks for something more to her life in the pants of every available boy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: still , i say hats off remain to wood , joan allen's subtle but believable performance as a lonely , unappreciated wife , and the always excellent kevin kline .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tobey maguire did a fine job , but his character which , perhaps , was the most intact , sensible person in the story , seemed a little lost .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he was needed , but perhaps he should've been used more .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the ice storm is being hailed by many as one of the best films of the year .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i hate to say that i don't agree , but i don't .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in fact , i can think of many other films that i would rank higher than this one .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even so , it is a very good film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it takes a lot of retrospect to fully appreciate it's art , but when you finally start seeing things in it that you didn't before , you start to grow even fonder of the characters and the story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: perhaps this is one to see , ponder , and then watch again with different eyes .
docs.label: positive
